ygData.subject: Re: Soul Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: But see then we run into the problem of 1hb or 2hb Me personally I think it should be 1hb because I just dont see a cleric wielding a 2 handed weapon, not
ygData.messageBody:
But see then we run into the problem of "1hb or 2hb"

Me personally I think it should be 1hb because I just dont see a cleric
wielding a 2 handed weapon, not even a staff. I always picture a cleric
wielding a mace (hammer if dwarf) and a shield.

Now a Morning Star is close enough for me, but a staff? Just seems wrong.

As we have said in the past, we are not a melee class, but I would still
love a one hander that did over 10 dmg with less than 40 delay.
What would be cool though is something like +7(or more) wis and a party heal
all or 10 GHeals.

Jaxim



>From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire
>Date: Thu, 8 Jul 1999 16:34:48 -0500
>
>From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>
>I agree that we need some good quest item. It doesn't have to be some
>awsome 1hb that does 15 dmg with 40 delay or something like that.
>Somehting
>like a 2hb with charges of mana regen, or like what Lohre said, +7 wis
>would
>be really ncie also. Have like 12 dmg delay 36 with +7 wisdom, cleric only
>and i'd be really happy.
>Allsar Olath`Vlos - 25th level - Rathe
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mike Schlagenhauf <trelane@...>
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Date: Thursday, July 08, 1999 4:26 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Soul Fire
>
>
> >From: "Mike Schlagenhauf" <trelane@...>
> >
> ><devil's advocate>
> >True, but how much of a tank/solo class is a cleric compared to a
>paladin?
> >And if there were to be a cleric super-weapon, would it be 1h or 2h? I
>know
> >personally I'd want 1h mace or hammer, but there are plenty of people
>who'd
> >want a nice 2h staff.
> ></devil's advocate>
> >
> >That aside, I agree, I've not found much in the way of a 1h blunt weapon
> >that does more than 9 dmg, and certainly none that have those sort of
>side
> >benefits. I know I'd love to have a weapon that alone just added another
>7
> >wis to my character. I've just read on EQ'Lizer that "two or three"
> >paladins already have them, and they're about lv 18. That screams to me
> >that either the game balance is about to be completely upended by a
>single
> >weapon (just my opinion from seeing the same sort of weapon
>implementation
> >on MUDs that I played), or that they're going to get something even
>better
> >that takes a higher level to accomplish the quest. All in all, I agree,
>I'd
> >like to see some more powerful 1h blunt, something with more than 9dmg
> >(maybe there is something like that, I just haven't heard about it yet).
> >--
> >Mike Schlagenhauf
> >trelane@...
> >Lohre
> >Ambassador of <Lifeforce Brigade>
> >Bristlebane Server
> >
> >----- Original Message -----

>STR
> >> +7, WIS +7, Effect: Complete Healing, WT 5.0 Class Pal.
> >> Thats not fair, Clerics should get something like this but instade of
> >sword
> >> it can be a mace or hammer or a staff.
